name: Small World Boat Ride Made by Xezner
name_original: Small World Boat Ride Made by Xezner
description:
This game was made during a game jam I hosted personally where I'm the only participant. It's my first ever game in unity and first ever game jam!

Web GL and PC Executable available here!

Game Jam Theme : Small World

Game : Small World Boat Ride inspired by Disneyland Small World Boat Ride

Credits to Everyone who supported me on my youtube channel (https://www.youtube.com/C/Xezner) and twitch channel (https://twitch.tv/xezner)

Made by : Xezner

Music Credits: 

Level 1 :
Music: Minigame - Parasail (The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild OST)
Link:

Credits to: Manaka Kataoka, Yasuaki Iwata, and Hajime Wakai

Level 2: 
Music: "Morning Frost" Composed by Jonathan Shaw 
Link: www.jshaw.co.uk

Level 3:
Music: Golden Age - World Music OFCL
Link:

Level 4:
Music: Spook by PeriTune
Link: https://soundcloud.com/sei_peridot/spook

submitted qubodup
Link: https://opengameart.org/content/2-high-quality-explosions
